name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.initial.delay.ms
description:
The initial delay (unit is ms) for locateFollowingBlock,
    the delay time will increase exponentially(double) for each retry
    until dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.max.delay.ms is reached,
    after that the delay for each retry will be
    dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.max.delay.ms.

name: ipc.[port_number].scheduler.priority.levels
description:
How many priority levels to use within the scheduler and call
    queue. This property applies to RpcScheduler and CallQueue.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.intermediate-user-done-dir.permissions
description:
The permissions of the user directories in
  ${mapreduce.jobhistory.intermediate-done-dir}. The user and the group
  permission must be 7, this is enforced.

name: fs.trash.checkpoint.interval
description:
Number of minutes between trash checkpoints.
  Should be smaller or equal to fs.trash.interval. If zero,
  the value is set to the value of fs.trash.interval.
  Every time the checkpointer runs it creates a new checkpoint
  out of current and removes checkpoints created more than
  fs.trash.interval minutes ago.

name: tfile.fs.input.buffer.size
description: Buffer size used for FSDataInputStream in bytes.

name: dfs.datanode.ec.reconstruct.read.bandwidthPerSec
description:
Specifies the maximum amount of bandwidth that the EC reconstruction can utilize for reading.
      When the bandwidth value is zero, there is no limit.
